Item ID1428

The mithril mace is a mace made of mithril. Like all mithril weapons, it requires 20 Attack to wield, and is exclusively used in melee combat.

Players can make a mithril mace with the Smithing skill at level 52 by using a mithril bar on an anvil with a hammer in their inventory, giving the player 50 Smithing experience.

It can be bought from Flynn's Mace Market in Falador.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).
